snippet: Within a week, the merger of two opposition groups that was depicted as a “game changer” that would end racial politics has collapsed amid mutual recriminations.
abstract: Merger of two prominent South African political groups collapses in acrimony, further splintering the opposition to the governing African National Congress.
lead_paragraph: Within a week, the merger of two opposition groups that was depicted as a “game changer” that would end racial politics has collapsed amid mutual recriminations.

headline.main: New Opposition Merger Founders in South Africa
headline.print_headline: New Opposition Merger Founders in South Africa
